feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: LES SUÊTES WIND WARNING, North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:41 p.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 12:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: NE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low plus 2. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 5 except plus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. Low plus 5 except plus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
